name:
The Legend of Zelda™:
Tri Force Heroes Demo
formal_name:
The Legend of Zelda™:
Tri Force Heroes Demo
description:
Wanted: Tri Force Heroes! Still not sure if you’re cut out to be a true hero? Then participate in this hero “try out” by downloading this special demo! During select times on 10/30 to 11/1, you can go online to meet up with other heroes in training. You will be able to try out 3 pre-selected dungeons with 3 pre-selected outfits.

If you miss your chance to go online, you can still play over local wireless with 2 other friends who also have a Nintendo 3DS family system with this demo version of the game. But with local wireless, only one dungeon is available. Single player mode and Download Play are not available, and you will not be able to connect with players who have the full version of the game.
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software. Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.

You can try online co-op play at the specific times below: 10/30: 3 p.m. - 5 p.m. PT 10/31: 3 p.m. - 5 p.m. PT 11/1: 3 p.m. - 5 p.m. PT
